title: The Annual Shine Bright and Vessel Lighting Ceremony at Hudson Yards
description: A holiday lighting ceremony featuring performances and displays at Hudson Yards, starting at 6pm.

title: 2025 New York Jewish Book Festival
description: A festival at the Museum of Jewish Heritage featuring various authors and discussions, with free admission and a suggested $10 donation.
address: Museum of Jewish Heritage, Battery Park

title: Fall Sample Sale + Food Pop-Up
description: A sample sale and food pop-up at Liz's Book Bar in Carroll Gardens.

title: 41st Westbeth Flea Market $10 Bag Sale
description: A flea market offering a $10 bag sale at Westbeth, located at 55 Bethune Street in the West Village.

title: Thrift2Death Fall Market
description: A fall market at Olly Olly Market in Chelsea, featuring free admission from 1-5pm and $10 early bird admission from 11am-1pm.

title: Morbid Anatomy Krampus Holiday Market
description: A holiday market at BKONE Tom Kane Theatre in Industry City, featuring $5 admission from 11am-6pm and $20 early bird admission from 10-11am.
address: BKONE Tom Kane Theatre, Industry City, Brooklyn

title: Brooklyn Cocktail Fest
description: An immersive cocktail festival at Industry City featuring unlimited samples, live entertainment, and food available for purchase. Save 40% with promo code 'theskint'.
address: Industry City â€“ Building 5, 33 35th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232

title: 20th Latin American Cultural Week
description: A cultural week featuring various events at different locations, with admission ranging from free to $20.

title: Jewish Book Month 100 Pop-Up Bookstore
description: A pop-up bookstore at 81 Hester Street in the Lower East Side, open Sunday and Monday.

title: 4th Annual Reel Works Film Festival
description: A film festival at SVA Theatre in Chelsea.

title: Video Art and Experimental Film Festival
description: A film festival showcasing video art and experimental films at Cinema Village in Greenwich Village.

title: American Woman: Reframing '70s Cinema
description: A film series at the Museum of the Moving Image featuring classic films from the 1970s, running through January 5, 2026.
address: Museum of the Moving Image, Astoria
